reviewText: These were all original Russian and German actual combat films. Many of which I don't think have have ever appeared in any other documentary, especially the Soviet films. But! The one item that fell short, in my opinion, was the very short length of this film. For a film to have you on the edge of your seat, and then end so soon, was a let down for me. The clarity of the film was superb, along with the choice of content.
